Class BoardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.project.server.BoardGame
  • public class BoardGame
extends java.lang.Object
    An encapsulation and abstraction of a game environment. Thus, also a model class.
    Author:
    Alex Petrov (s2478412) and Kagan Gulsum (s2596091)
